articles.title: Little Richard obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Prime force of rock’n’roll who made an explosive impact with songs such as Tutti Frutti, Good Golly, Miss Molly, Lucille and Long Tall Sally
articles.content:
Little Richard, who has died aged 87, was the self-proclaimed king of rocknroll. Such was his explosive impact that many of the baby boom generation will vividly recall the moment when they first encountered his assault on melody.
